page.title: 07A new housing estate.
page.content: The Woodlands is a new estate on the outskirts of Crewe. It was planned to have 91 houses but building stopped in 1983 when 58 houses were complete. A different building company is considering building more houses on the estate. The first houses to be completed were occupied in march 1978. The estate is open plan and consists of 6 different types of houses........ The nevada ,nevada l, lexington l, lexington, baltimore/columbia, madison. The average length of a rear garden is 11 metres. The average width of a rear garden is 11 metres 50 cms. The average floor area of a house is 1156 square feet. The houses now cost between 30 thousand and 40 thousand pounds.
